text: (upbeat music)
- So Koch industry is a very diversified,
multinational conglomerates.
We're in industries,
everything from polymers and fibers
to data technology and analytics

with presence in over 50
countries around the globe.
The challenge that brought us to AWS

was the need to be competitive
in a digital first economy
and we realized that we had to transform
and make cloud part of our strategy
and AWS was the partner that stepped up

and really helped us on
our transformation journey.
So we started building with AWS
with just some small bets

and some small applications
to test out technologies
and get started on our journey.
So we progressed,
we moved from a lift and shift attitude

to a complete refactor and
modernization of our apps
and partnership with AWS.
Our journey to the cloud was really
a journey about becoming data literate
and driving decisions based on data
and we are now seeing those benefits
not just with our internal customers,
but we actually have external facing apps
that are utilizing cloud technologies.
